name: pixelated-user-agent-web-ui
description: The front-end module for the pixelated user agent

scripts.test: npm run jshint --silent && npm run build && node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --single-run --browsers PhantomJS $GRUNT_OPTS
scripts.debug: npm run build && node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --browsers Chrome $GRUNT_OPTS
scripts.watch: npm run compass-watch & npm run handlebars-watch
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run handlebars && npm run add_git_version && npm run compass
scripts.minify_html: node_modules/.bin/html-minifier app/index.html --collapse-whitespace | sed 's|<!--usemin_start-->.*<!--usemin_end-->|<script src="assets/app.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>|' > dist/index.html
